QuestData.Title: Harnessing Their Power
QuestData.Description: Ol' Grommash Hellscream found a way to weaponize the gronn. Vol'jin wants to know how.$b$bTravel to the Iron Front and kill one of them big beasties, then bring back its war harness. You might be needin' help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Wargronn Harness from an Iron Wargronn at the Iron Front in Tanaan Jungle.
